price: Ndetse n’abari batuye i Ayikati[1] (na bo) bari inkozi z’ibibi.
footnotes: [1] Al Ayikat: Ni ahantu hari ishyamba ry’inzitane hafi y’ahitwa Madiyani, ari naho Intumwa Shuwayibu yoherejwe.

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.
